name: ModelScanner
description: HiddenLayer Model Scanner for Azure DevOps
author: HiddenLayer

inputs.name: modelName
inputs.label: Model Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the model to scan

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: URL to the HiddenLayer API if you're using the OEM/self-hosted version

inputs.name: failOnDetection
inputs.label: True to fail the pipeline if a model is deemed malicious
inputs.helpMarkDown: True to fail the pipeline if a model is deemed malicious

inputs.name: hlClientID
inputs.label: Your HiddenLayer API Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: (required for SaaS only): Your HiddenLayer API Client ID

inputs.name: hlClientSecret
inputs.label: Your HiddenLayer API Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: (required for SaaS only): Your HiddenLayer API Client Secret

inputs.name: sarifFile
inputs.label: Path to output SARIF file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to output SARIF file for GitHub integration

inputs.name: communityScan
inputs.label: Community Scan Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of community scan to perform (e.g., Hugging Face models, cloud storage models)

inputs.name: modelVersion
inputs.label: Model Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the model (required for community scans other than Hugging Face, defaults to 'main' for Hugging Face)

inputs.name: azureBlobSasKey
inputs.label: Azure Blob SAS Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: SAS key for Azure Blob Storage
